PageWidgetPortable.Title: I051 - Contas do plano referencial
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_CONTAPLANOSREFERENCIAIS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ORIGEM IN ( SELECT REL.HANDLE FROM CT_CONTAGERENCIALCONTAS REL WHERE REL.PLANO = (SELECT PAR.PLANOREFERENCIAL FROM ED_PARAMETROSFCONT PAR WHERE PAR.EMPRESA = @EMPRESAMESTRE(ED_PARAMETROSFCONT) AND (SELECT PERIODO.DATAINICIAL FROM ED_PERIODOS PERIODO WHERE PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) ) BETWEEN PAR.DATAINICIAL AND PAR.DATAFINAL ) ) AND (A.CONTA = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3230_at6509_hs13724a3.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
